conbody.p: When a notification request is received for Group type, then NS caches all attributes from the request. The Group details and group notification profiles are fetched from the NCC database. Then the notifications are sent according to the following logic.

row.entry: If channel is SMS or EMAIL or both, then notification is sent to the Group owner. Else, notification is sent to the target URL.

entry.p: For each Device in the Group, the notification profile is retrieved, including language and channel information.
Notification type is retrieved from the group notification profile.
Notification is sent to each Device and admin with appropriate profile, language, and channel.
For each Device in the Group, the notification profile is retrieved, including language and channel information.
Notification type is retrieved from the group notification profile.
Notification is sent to each Device except the group admin with appropriate profile, language, and channel.
If channel is SMS or EMAIL or both, then send notification to the Group owner. Else, send notification to the target URL.
For the Device ID in the request, send notification to each with appropriate profile, language, and channel.

row.entry: For the Device ID in the request, send notification to each with appropriate profile, language, and channel.
